testsuite.name: JsonDataSerializer Tests

testcase.name: serialize null list should throw exception
deserialize from non-existent file should return empty list
serialize empty list should create empty JSON array
serialize should save students to JSON file
deserialize with null class should throw exception
serialize and deserialize should preserve data integrity
deserialize should load students from JSON file
serialize with null file path should throw exception
